0.0.6.name: wordpress/wp-client-client-portals-file-upload-invoices-billing
0.0.6.description:
WP-Client WordPress Web Portal Plugin

Visit Website >> WP-Client.com is the home of WP-Client Pro, a premium, fully featured Web Portal plugin for WordPress.

What is WP-Client Lite?

WP-Client Lite gives you the very basic components of a Client Portal, but there are many features in the Pro version that are not included in the Lite version.

WP-Client Lite is not meant to be a fully featured Client Portal, but rather a glimpse into what is included and possible in the WP-Client Pro version.

WP-Client Pro is in constant development and is fully supported. New features are added weekly, and your suggestions are welcome.

See a full list of features  >> WEBSITE >> WP-Client.com
